mapper.select: SELECT * FROM attraction WHERE site_1 like CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') or attraction_Name like CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
SELECT * FROM attraction WHERE attraction_Num IN ${value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tourdiary ( user_Id, post_Title, post_Body, readCount, post_Like, hashTag, start_Date, total_Date, end_Date, area, user_Pic, rep_Pic ) VALUES( #{user_Id}, #{post_Title}, #{post_Body}, #{readCount}, #{post_Like}, #{hashTag}, #{start_date}, #{total_date}, #{end_date}, #{area}, #{userPic}, #{repPic} )
